title: Railworks TS2014 Just trains Bishop Auckland to Darlington Scena
description:
SCENARIO DETAILS

All In A DayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Work Part 1
Take 150211 on the 06:47 Darlington - Bishop Auckland and return service. Start out by shunting into Platform 4 ready to load your passengers.

All In A DayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Work Part 2
Take 156480 on a late running 07:48 Darlington - Bishop Auckland return service. Class 156 Northern Rail.

All In A DayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Work Part 3
Take 153352 & 153307 on the 10:54 Darlington - Bishop Auckland service. Class 153 DMU and Class 60

All In A DayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Work Part 4
Return 153307 & 153352 back to Darlington with a Class 153 DMU.

All In A DayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Work Part 5
Take steam loco 44826 for a run up the track at Shildon Museum.

All In A DayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Work Part 6
Take 37003 for a run up the track at Shildon.

All In A DayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Work Part 7
Take a 156 on a wet late afternoon run along the line and back.

All In A DayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Work Part 8
Take 150214 from Darlington to Bishop Auckland to rescue 153307 and 153352 which have failed at Bishop Auckland.

Autumnal Feel
Take 20142 & 20227 on an RHTT Run from Darlington to Bishop Auckland and return.

Deltic Stanhope Special
Take Deltic 55019 from Darlington to Bishop Auckland calling at Shildon only as part of a Kings Cross to Stanhope rail tour.

Deltic Stanhope Return
After a great afternoon on the Weardale Railway it's time for the return Journey to London Kings Cross. Stopping at Shildon, you are to take the service as far as Darlington.

Northern Rail Fun Day - Part 1
Northern Rail have arranged with the NRM to do a fun day at Shildon - you need to take some units up to Shildon for display.

Northern Rail Fun Day - Part 2
Northern Rail have arranged with the NRM to do a fun day at Shildon. This duty requires you to take one of the new 166 units on a demonstration run at Shildon.

Northern Rail Fun Day - Part 3
Northern Rail have arranged with the NRM to do a fun day at Shildon. The day was wet, but still a success. It's now time to return the units back to Darlington ready for another day in service.

Shildonfest Part 1
Shunt some wagons out of the way ready for Shildonfest.

Shildonfest Part 2
Bring up some locos from Darlington ready for Shildonfest.

Shildonfest Part 3
Having taken your break at Shildon you are now to return to Darlington with the wagons which were shunted by 37003 earlier.

Shildonfest Part 4
Following the replacement of Northern Rail 150 units, one has been repainted into 'Regional Railways' livery and is visiting Shildon for the weekend. Take the unit during the early hours of the morning from Darlington to Shildon.

Shildonfest Part 5
It's the day of Shildonfest and a number of 'special tours' are scheduled using top and tailed diesel locos. You are in charge of the first trip down to Darlington and back this morning.

Shildonfest Part 6
Your final duty today is a short one; the Deltic and Class 20 are currently stabled up near the engine shed, and you need to bring the Class 150 to the platform ready for loading and the 11:30 trip to Darlington and back which another driver will take.
System Requirements:

Train Simulator 2013 
Bishop Auckland to Darlington route
Class 150 
Class 153 DMU Advanced
Class 156 
Class 20 Collection 
Class 60

ENJOY GUYS AND SEEEDDDD PLS!!!!
